Package org.moeaframework.core.fitness

package org.moeaframework.core.fitness
Implementations of various fitness assignment methods.
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    org.moeaframework.core
    Contains the core classes used by this framework.
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    AdditiveEpsilonIndicatorFitnessEvaluator
    Indicator-based fitness using the additive ε-indicator.
    CrowdingDistanceFitnessEvaluator
    Assigns fitness values based on the crowding distance from fast non-dominated sorting.
    FitnessBasedArchive
    Maintains a non-dominated archive of solutions with a maximum capacity.
    HypervolumeContributionFitnessEvaluator
    Assigns the fitness of solutions based on their contribution to the overall hypervolume.
    HypervolumeFitnessEvaluator
    Indicator-based fitness using the hypervolume metric.
    IndicatorFitnessEvaluator
    Abstract class for assigning fitness based on a binary indicator.
